kindOfTripHostingOverview.description: Describe the type of trip you're planning to host.

targetingTypesOfTravelers.description: The kind of audience you are hosting a trip for.

isActive.description: If `isActive=true`, the host request is not deleted.

pastAccomplishmentReferences.description: The host's past experiences reference links.

isFavorite.description: If `true`, the user has saved this trip for future reference.

isMember.description: If `true`, then the member is counted as an active member of the trip.

isOwner.description: If the member is the owner of the trip or not.

updatedAt.description: The last time the user interacted with the trip.

toMemberId.description: The user id of the receiver.

fromMemberId.description: The user id of the sender.

errorCode.description: The error code to handle internationalization(i18n).

isArchived.description: The trip is expired because the startDate is earlier than todays date.

pathHostRequestId.name: hostRequestId
pathHostRequestId.description: The Id of the host request.

pathBookingId.name: bookingId
pathBookingId.description: The Id of the booking request.

queryLimit.name: limit
queryLimit.description: Limit the number of records on each page.

queryInterests.name: interests
queryInterests.description: Search for interests by comma separated value. Ex. value1,value2.

queryDestinations.name: destinations
queryDestinations.description: Search for destinations by comma separated value. Ex. value1,value2.

queryIsMember.name: isMember
queryIsMember.description: List all of the user's trips.

queryIsFavorite.name: isFavorite
queryIsFavorite.description: List all of the user's favorite trips.

queryIsArchived.name: isArchived
queryIsArchived.description: List all of the user's archived trips.

queryStatus.name: status
queryStatus.description: List all the trips with the status.

queryIsHost.name: isHost
queryIsHost.description: List the details given the host's permissions, otherwise it will list the details as normal user.

kindOfTripHostingOverview.description: Describe the type of trip you're planning to host.

targetingTypesOfTravelers.description: The kind of audience you are hosting a trip for.

pastAccomplishmentReferences.description: The host's past experiences reference links.

spokenLanguages.description: A list of languages the user can speak, separated by comma.

info.title: Tripsha API documentation
info.description: This is the complete API documentation for all of Tripsha's APIs.

get.description: Returns a list of activity logs related to the logged in user.
Returns a list of matching host requests.
Returns a host request based on a request Id.

put.description: Updates a single host request based on the Id supplied, it will also update the status of the request.

delete.description: Deletes a single host request based on the Id supplied.

get.description: Returns a list of bookings related to the logged in user.
Returns a booking based on a booking Id.

put.description: Updates a single booking based on the Id supplied and data.

delete.description: Delete a single booking based on the Id supplied.

post.description: Perform an action on the booking.

get.description: Return a list of matching countries.
Returns a list of trip members.

post.description: Perform various operations on a member.

get.description: Return a list of user messages.
Return a list of matching interest tags.
Return a list of matching trip tags.
Return a list of my trips.
Return a list of saved trips.
Return a trip based on a trip Id.

put.description: Update a single trip based on the Id supplied and data.

delete.description: Delete a single trip based on the Id supplied.

get.description: Return a user based on a user Id.

put.description: Update a single user based on the Id supplied and the data.

delete.description: Delete a single user based on the Id supplied.
